ygData.subject: Re: L 11 song and L21+ sites?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Cindra s Charismatic Carillion - 11th Level In Kelethin you can learn this fascinating song which entrances people to such a degree that they will like you
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:29 AM 6/14/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
>
>I've checked a couple of decent sources, and they disagree on what the lvl
>11 song is. I think EQVault says it's one thing, but it's broken.
>
>Could someone set me straight, please (and if you know where to find it,
>that'd be great, too :) )?

Cindra's Charismatic Carillion - 11th Level
In Kelethin you can learn this fascinating song which entrances people to
such a degree that they will like you more. Though it
will occasionally allow a Bard greater discounts on items, it is more
useful in allowing one to communicate with hostile beings.


>Secondly, even though it'll probably be months before I get to lvl 21 (I
>enjoy my cleric and mage too, but bard most of all), where can I find the
>higher level songs? Are there any high level bard web sites?

You can find out a lot at the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm

Talies the Wanderer
